info.name: Moonify Charamel/Silvermel
info.description: Modifies the Charamel and Silvermel themes for Firefox to make them integrate better with Pale Moon.
info.additionalInfo: !! Please note: This style is deprecated. Please use this instead: http://addons.palemoon.org/addon/theme-shim/ !! Requires either Charamel version 1.5.7(.1-signed) or Silvermel version 1.5.7(.1-signed). v1.1 - Pale Moon 26 compatibility v1.0 - initial release
